text: Jab meray banday meray baray mein aap say sawal keren to aap keh den kay mein boht hi qarib hun her pukarney walay ki pukar ko jab kabhi woh mujhay pukaray qabool kerta hun iss liye logon ko bhi chahaiye kay woh meri baat maan liya keren aur mujh per eman rakhen yehi unn ki bhalaee ka baees hai
